data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khoza, Thembile T., Lyle, Robin (2019): Four new species of the sac spider genus Planochelas Lyle & Haddad, 2009 (Araneae, Trachelidae) from central and southern Africa. African Invertebrates 60 (2): 147-164, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.60.35269, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.60.35269
